title: SET_PLAYER_INVINCIBLE
content:
0x239528EACDC3E7DE0xDFB9A2A2// SetPlayerInvincible
void SET_PLAYER_INVINCIBLE(Player player, BOOL bInvincible);Parameters:player: The player index.bInvincible: Make the player impervious to all forms of damage.
